TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Ray’in, title = Ray’in, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ray’in} }

S.FORM: ray'in Itiniay i Nanzhuang Cen no Miaoli ko ray'in a niyaro', 148 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 352 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 41% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 143 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 59% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 209 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Saysiyat37%, Tayal2%, Paiwan1%, Amis1%.

ray'in Itiniay i Nanzhoang Cen no Miaoli ko ray'in a niyaro', 148 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 352 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 41% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 143 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 59% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 209 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Saysiyat37%, Tayal2%, Paiwan1%, Amis1%.
